Package index

Rasters

Functions to manipulate SpatRaster objects.

shift_and_crop()
Shift, rotate, and crop a raster using a vector
shift_and_rotate()
Shift and rotate a raster or a vector

Vectors

Functions to manipulate SpatVector and sf objects.

filter_points_on_land()
Filter points on land

APIs

Client functions for accessing external data sources.

qualocep_download()
Get Qual o CEP data
sidra_download_by_year()
Get and aggregate data by year from SIDRA API

Brazil

Functions to access Brazilian geographic and administrative data.

brazil_municipality()
Get Brazilian municipalities data
brazil_municipality_code()
Get Brazilian municipalities codes
brazil_municipality_coords()
Get Brazilian municipalities geographic coordinates
brazil_municipality_latitude()
Get Brazilian municipalities latitude
brazil_municipality_longitude()
Get Brazilian municipalities longitude
brazil_state()
Get Brazilian state names
brazil_state_code()
Get Brazilian state codes
brazil_state_capital()
Get Brazilian state capital names
brazil_state_latitude()
Get Brazilian state latitude
brazil_state_longitude()
Get Brazilian state longitude
brazil_state_by_utc()
Get Brazilian state names by UTC
brazil_fu()
Get Brazilian federative unit abbreviations
brazil_region()
Get Brazilian regions
brazil_region_code()
Get Brazilian region codes
brazil_render_address()
Render Brazilian addresses

World

Functions to access world geographic and administrative data.

country_names()
Get country names

WorldClim

Functions to access and manipulate WorldClim data.

worldclim_extract_variable() worldclim_extract_resolution() worldclim_extract_month() worldclim_extract_year() worldclim_extract_year_month() worldclim_extract_year_group() worldclim_extract_gcm() worldclim_extract_ssp()
Extract components from WorldClim filenames
worldclim_to_ascii()
Convert WorldClim GeoTIFF files to Esri ASCII Grid
worldclim_random()
Return a random WorldClim data selection
worldclim_url()
Get paths to WorldClim data

Utilities

Utility functions for spatial data manipulation.

closest_geobr_year()
Get the closest year available in the geobr package
fix_postal_code()
Fix postal code numbers
map_fill_data()
Prepare data to fill a map
remove_unique_outliers()
Remove unique outliers from raster files
test_geobr_connection()
Test geobr Package Connection with Its Server
unique_outliers()
Return unique outliers
